humor.quote: I’m not lazy; I’m on energy-saving mode.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I didn’t oversleep—my bed kidnapped me.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I follow a seafood diet—I see food and I eat it.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: My patience is like my phone battery—always running low.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I used to be indecisive, but now I’m not so sure.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: If stress burned calories, I’d be invisible.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: My brain has too many tabs open.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm multitasking: I can waste time, be unproductive, and procrastinate all at once.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Common sense is like deodorant—those who need it most never use it.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Exercise? I thought you said 'extra fries'.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I’m not weird; I’m limited edition.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: My mood depends on how good my hair looks.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not late; I run on my own timezone.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I don’t trip—I do random gravity checks.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I speak fluent sarcasm.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Some people need a high-five. In the face. With a chair.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Why be moody when you can shake your booty?
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I’m in shape. Unfortunately, that shape is a potato.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: My bed and I are perfect for each other, but my alarm clock keeps trying to break us up.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: If Monday had a face, I would punch it.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I woke up early today. Or as most people call it: ‘late’.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Reality called, so I hung up.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: My wallet is like an onion—opening it makes me cry.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I don’t need a hairstylist, my pillow gives me a new style every morning.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Running late counts as exercise, right?
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not short, I'm concentrated awesome.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Don't worry. I forgot what I was saying too.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I tried to be normal once. Worst two minutes of my life.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: My brain: 1% useful thoughts, 99% random nonsense.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not clumsy; the floor just hates me.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Calories? I think you mean delicious points.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I’m not arguing. I’m just explaining why I’m right.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: If I were you, I’d adore me.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I put the ‘pro’ in procrastination.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I need a six-month vacation twice a year.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: If I’m late, it’s because I didn’t want to come.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: My superpower is doing nothing for hours.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I whisper ‘what the hell’ to myself at least twenty times a day.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I need a pause button for life… and maybe a rewind.
humor.author: Unknown

life.quote: Life is a collection of moments—make them meaningful.

life.quote: The more you appreciate, the more life gives you to appreciate.

life.quote: Life becomes lighter when you stop carrying unnecessary burdens.

life.quote: Life teaches you through both blessings and lessons.

life.quote: Letting go is an act of love toward yourself.
